parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ignition switch can cause the vehicle to catch fire, resulting in damage or total loss of the vehicle. It can also cause the vehicle to stall or become inoperable, leading to accidents or strandings.
symptoms: smoke is seen coming from the dashboard
the ignition switch breaks and hangs out from the harness
the internal mechanism in the steering column breaks
the rack and rods inside the steering column break.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the vehicle to catch fire, resulting in damage or total loss of the vehicle. It can also cause the vehicle to stall or become inoperable, leading to accidents or strandings.
symptoms: smoke is seen coming from the dashboard

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering column can cause the vehicle to become inoperable, leading to accidents or strandings.
symptoms: The internal mechanism in the steering column breaks
the rack and rods inside the steering column break
the steering column is damaged due to recall work performed on the ignition switch.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS brake system can cause the vehicle to lose control, skid, or accelerate unexpectedly, leading to accidents or near-misses.
Excessive wear on the front brakes can cause the vehicle to take longer to stop, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: squealing noise when applying the brakes.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the master cylinder can cause extended stopping distance, leading to accidents or near-misses.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Cracked Floor Pan and Seat Mounts
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cracked floor pan and seat mounts can cause the front seats to wobble, bounce, and move, increasing the stress on the floor pan, which can lead to a break and compromise the structural integrity of the vehicle, posing a safety risk to occupants.
symptoms: the floor pan cracks around the bolts

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A stuck gas pedal can cause the vehicle to accelerate uncontrollably, leading to accidents or loss of control, which can result in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: and the vehicle is difficult to control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: While not directly related to safety, paint chipping and cracking can lead to rust and corrosion, which can compromise the structural integrity of the vehicle over time.
symptoms: The paint is chipping or cracking
exposing the underlying metal to the elements.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The design of the door can lead to injuries, such as finger amputation, due to the potential for trapping or crushing.
symptoms: The door can trap or crush fingers
due to the design of the door and frame.
